## PR Title Format
<!-- Ensure your PR title follows the convention for automatic version bumping -->

**Required Format:**
- Bug fixes: `fix: description` or `fix(scope): description`
- New features: `feat: description` or `feat(scope): description`
- Breaking changes: Any title + `major` label

**Examples:**
- `fix: resolve memory leak in data processor`
- `feat(api): add new authentication endpoint`
- `fix(ui): correct button alignment on mobile`

## Version Bump
<!-- This will be automatically determined based on your PR title and labels -->

- **major** label â†’ Major version bump (e.g., 1.0.0 â†’ 2.0.0)
- **feat:** prefix â†’ Minor version bump (e.g., 1.0.0 â†’ 1.1.0)
- **fix:** prefix â†’ Patch version bump (e.g., 1.0.0 â†’ 1.0.1)
- Other titles â†’ Patch version bump (default)
